articles.description: Ubisoft is offering three free titles via its Ubisoft Connect client for one day only. They include Starlink: Battle for Atlas, Trials Rising, and Anno 1701.
articles.content:
(Image: Ubisoft)
If part of your holiday break means jumping into a new video game, Ubisoft has you covered. You don't even have to wait until you tear into this year's gifts to try something new. P… [+1538 chars]
